name: Photography
description: Capture the moments with your photography skills. Participants must submit their photos under a chosen theme. All photos must be original and not edited beyond basic adjustments.
rules: All photos must be original.
No heavy editing; only basic adjustments are allowed.
Submit photos under the chosen theme.
Submissions can be made under Phone Photography or DSLR Photography.
Online Submission: Upload your photo on Instagram and tag @ubuntu.pvr. Mention your category (Phone/DSLR) in the caption.
Offline Submission: Submit a hard copy of your photo by 20th Dec (till 11 am). Ensure that your Instagram account name is clearly written on the back of the photo.

name: Rangon ki Dastan (Rangoli)
description: Create beautiful Rangoli designs and showcase your artistry. Designs should be on a 4x4 feet surface. Participants can use colored powders, flowers, or other materials.
rules: Entry Fees: ₹50.
Per college: 2 entries.
All Rangoli designs must reflect the vintage theme.
Participants can depict vintage elements like old cultural symbols, classic motifs, traditional patterns, or retro art from previous eras.
Participants can compete individually.
A maximum of 1 hour 30 minutes will be given to each team to complete their Rangoli.
Participants should bring their own Rangoli materials (e.g., colored powders, flowers, rice, or sand). Some basic materials might be provided by the college if needed.
Only natural colors and materials (e.g., flowers, organic powders) are encouraged for eco-friendliness.
No use of toxic materials, paints, or adhesives that might damage surfaces.
No references are allowed (e.g., mobile phones).

name: Timeless Beauty (Face Beauty)
description: Display your beauty and makeup skills in this competition. Models and makeup artists can team up. Participants must follow the event’s theme, and models should be prepared for the session.
rules: Participants must strictly adhere to the vintage theme. Makeup looks should be inspired by iconic eras like the 1920s, 1950s, 1970s, 1980s, etc.
Participants may choose a specific era or blend elements from multiple decades.
Participants must arrive 30 minutes before the start of the competition for check-in and setup.
Participants are encouraged to bring their own materials; all makeup products used must be non-toxic and safe for skin.
Use of references (e.g., mobiles, photographs, stencils) is prohibited.

name: Reel it Feel it (Reel Making)
description: Make a short and creative reel video for the competition. Videos should not exceed 30 seconds. The content should be original, and participants must follow the event theme.
rules: Videos must not exceed 30 seconds.
Content should be original and follow the event theme.
The theme will be given on the day of the CL meet.
Participants must create piracy-free videos and upload them in the reel section on Instagram.
Tag @ubuntu.pvr and write a suitable caption while posting.

name: Mr. and Ms. UBUNTU
description: Compete for the title of Mr. and Ms. UBUNTU in this pageant. Participants will be judged on personality, talent, and appearance. Participants must prepare a performance, talent, or skill presentation.
rules: Participants must prepare a performance, talent, or skill presentation.
Judging will be based on personality, talent, and appearance.
Participants should arrive at least 30 minutes before the event starts.
Any participant who misbehaves or argues after a warning will be disqualified.

name: Fashion Show (Retro Runway)
description: Show off your fashion style in the retro-themed runway show. Participants should showcase their best vintage outfits. Models must be ready for multiple costume changes during the event.
rules: Models must be ready for multiple costume changes.
Participants should showcase vintage outfits.
Judging criteria include creativity, synchronization, and adherence to the theme.

name: Dance (Aaja Nachle)
description: Join the dance competition and groove to the music. Choreography can be performed solo or in groups. Performances should be within 4 minutes, and teams should not exceed 6 members.
rules: Performance time limit: 4 minutes.
Teams should not exceed 6 members.
Judging criteria include creativity, synchronization, and energy.

name: Online Gaming: Stumble Guys
description: Compete in the Stumble Guys gaming event. Players must navigate obstacles in a race to the finish. Fair play and no external tools are allowed.
rules: Fair play must be followed.
No external tools allowed.
Players must have a stable internet connection.

name: Gully Badminton
description: Play badminton in a unique gully-style competition. The rules are modified for a fun, challenging experience. Players must follow the modified gully rules provided at the start of the match.
rules: Participants should bring their own rackets.
The shuttlecock will be provided by the college.
Judges' decisions will be final.

name: Nakh Shikant (Nail Art)
description: Show off your nail art creativity in this competition. Participants must provide their own supplies and models. Designs should be original and not copied.
rules: Nail art must reflect a specific vintage era (e.g., 1920s Art Deco, 1950s Pinup, 1960s Mod, 1970s, 1980s, etc.).
Participants must provide their own supplies and models.
Stencils are not allowed.
Designs should incorporate vintage-inspired elements.
Use of references (e.g., mobiles, photographs, stencils) is prohibited.
